title: Benefits section copy update + justified benefit descriptions

requirements.summary: Rename the specified Benefits card title from "Responsible Materials" to "Sustainable" without changing any other page copy.
acceptanceCriteria: The benefits card that previously displayed the title "Responsible Materials" now displays "Sustainable".
No other section titles or copy elsewhere on the page are changed.

file_operations.description: Update the Benefits data so the card title text changes from "Responsible Materials" to "Sustainable" (scoped only to the Benefits section rendering under the container element referenced by /html/body/div/div/main/section[4]/div[1]).

requirements.summary: Render only the Benefits card description/subtext paragraphs with justified text alignment while keeping icons and titles centered.
acceptanceCriteria: Benefit description text is rendered with CSS text alignment set to justify on mobile and desktop.
Icons and titles remain visually centered as they are now; only the description/subtext alignment changes.
No other paragraph text in other sections is affected.

file_operations.description:
Adjust the Benefits card markup/classes so the card container continues centering the icon and title, but the description

uses justified text alignment (e.g., apply a justify utility only to the description element and/or move the centering utility off the wrapper). Ensure the change is limited to the Benefits section subtree under /html/body/div/div/main/section[4]/div[1] and does not affect other sections' paragraphs.
